Wheels: Add wheels to the bottom of the basket to make it easier to move around.
Hanging hooks: Add hanging hooks on the sides of the basket to hang clothes on while they are being washed.
Built-in sorting compartments: Incorporate built-in sorting compartments to separate clothes by type, such as shirts, pants, and delicates.
Smart technology: Integrate smart technology, such as a Wi-Fi-enabled sensor, to monitor the load and alert when it's time to wash.
Self-cleaning mechanism: Include a self-cleaning mechanism to remove dirt and stains from the basket.
